embed.title: UnitCorrector
embed.description:
A Discord bot that automatically provides SI-Units. This bot will listen for any messages in Discord that contain non-SI units and when detected, reply with the message converted to SI-Units.

*Are you tired of a car that weighs 100 Stones, is 10 feet high, and can drive 50 miles at 5 degrees freedom? Worry no more! Your car weighs 0.64t, is 3.05m high, and can drive 80.47km at -15Â°C from now on!*

fields.name: :information_source: **Commands**
fields.value: Please use the `!help` to list all possible commands!
